objects.text: KEEPS DRINKS COLD FOR 24 HOURS • LEAKPROOF DESIGN
VACUUM-INSULATED • DISHWASHER SAFE • FITS MOST CUP HOLDERS

product_details.name: Contigo Jackson Chill 2.0 Stainless Steel Water Bottle with AUTOPOP Lid, 24oz.
product_details.description: Pop, sip, and click your way to better hydration. The AUTOPOP Stainless Steel Water Bottle features a wide mouthpiece for convenient on-the-go one-handed drinking in between all of the tasks on your to-do list. Whether you’re working out or working at your desk, the double-wall vacuum-insulated stainless steel body keeps drinks cold for 24 hours. When you’re done drinking, click the lid back into place to help protect the bottle from dirt and grime, then lock the lid for extra protection. The leakproof design means no spills in your car, on your desk, or wherever you are. Carrying it around is easy with the integrated handle. Both lid and body are top-rack dishwasher-safe for easy cleanups. Fits most cup holders.

banner_details:
This banner features a modern, tech-inspired design with a clean layout oriented around a central product image ("product_image"). A dark gradient background enhances visual depth, with concentric line circles and scattered dot clusters adding a subtle futuristic accent. The heading ("heading") is bold and centered at the top in large white font, creating a strong visual anchor. Just below, a blue-toned subheading ("subheading") adds contrast, followed by the tagline ("tagline") describing key product features. Below the product image, two centered description text blocks ("description_1" and "description_2") emphasize benefits. The pricing ("price") is prominent and large, paired with a stylized call-to-action button ("cta_button") containing "cta_text," guiding users toward interaction.

**Color Palette**:
- Midnight Blue: #051e33
- Deep Navy: #1a3853
- Sky Blue: #2a93c9
- Aqua Blue Gradient: Linear from #2a93c9 to #126d9e
- Pure White: #FFFFFF
product_color: This product image showcases a sleek, matte black Contigo travel mug, creating a modern and minimalist aesthetic. The primary color is a deep matte black (#1A1A1A), giving it a bold and sophisticated appearance. The lid combines dark gray tones (#4A4A4A) and soft charcoal (#2F2F2F) for subtle contrast, while the white text (#FFFFFF) on the body enhances visibility and adds a clean touch. The colors blend seamlessly through their satin-finish textures, maintaining visual unity while still highlighting key features like the logo and "24 OZ" marking. Ideal colors for an advertisement banner include matte black, charcoal gray, dark gray, and crisp white.
